title: Multi-dimensional imaging of cellular dynamics and function
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: This grant funded sophisticated light microscopy imaging equipment, and by training users we will have enhanced the pool of trained researchers for the medical, basic science, and biotechnology areas. Healthcare,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology Economic
findingsText: This was an equipment grant that funded light microscopy equipment that has been used to further our understanding of the dynamic behaviour of living cells. Since this was an equipment grant, it has facilitated research in a broad range of projects that may have relevance in the long term to healthcare. Healthcare
